# Summary

[Rent control](../aggregators/rent-control.qmd) makes workers less responsive to geographic shifts in job opportunities, reducing labor mobility [@Kholodilin2024]. This is related to how [rent control reduces residential mobility](rent-control-reduces-residential-mobility.qmd).
